name: flush
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: When you flush, you become red in the face, especially as a result of strong emotions, heat, or alcohol.

example.eg: She flushed with pleasure as she accepted the prize.
example.egtrans: 她领奖时高兴得红光满面。

example.eg: The champagne had caused his face to flush.

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: If you flush a toilet, or if a toilet flushes, its contents empty and it fills with water again.

example.eg: My children never flush the toilet after them.
example.egtrans: 我的孩子们用过马桶后从来不冲。

example.eg: I can't get the toilet to flush.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to get rid of something by putting it in the toilet and operating the toilet

example.eg: I tend to flush old medicines down the toilet.
example.egtrans: 我往往用马桶冲走过期药品。

name: flush
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: at the same level as another surface

example.eg: I want the light fittings to be flush with the ceiling.
example.egtrans: 我想让灯具配件与天花板齐平。

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: I've just been paid so I'm feeling flush.
example.egtrans: 我刚领了薪水，所以感觉挺有钱的。

name: flush
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a red colour that appears on your face or body because you are embarrassed, hot, etc.
trans_examp.trans_cn: （因尴尬、发热等原因）脸红，皮肤发红

example.eg: A faint pink flush coloured her cheeks.
example.egtrans: 她的双颊泛出淡淡的红晕。

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

phrase.phrase_title: a flush of anger, excitement, pleasure, etc.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a sudden strong feeling of anger, excitement, pleasure, etc.

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when the contents of a toilet empty and it fills with water
the handle or button that you push to make a toilet empty and fill with water
trans_examp.trans_cn: 马桶的冲水把手（或按钮）

example.eg: He pressed the flush with his hand.
example.egtrans: 他用手按下了冲水按钮。

dsense.name: flush
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a number of playing cards held by one player that are all from the same suit
